name: vermiculite
content:
Add to word list

a mineral that can absorb water and is used for many purposes, including in industry, building, and when growing plants: Sow the seeds half a centimetre deep in a tray of vermiculite. Vermiculite is a naturally occurring substance that was once commonly used in insulation and potting soils.
More examplesFewer examplesDecades of vermiculite mining released toxic asbestos in the area that has been linked to hundreds of deaths and cases of illness.To grow salad vegetables indoors you will need some seed compost or, better still, vermiculite.
